h1_title: How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items
h2_title: Claiming Deluxe Edition Items in Black Myth: Wukong
content: There will be 7 items waiting for you there including a **Weapon, Armor set, and a Curio**. If you've purchased the Deluxe Edition after passing this point, just interact with the nearest Shrine to collect your items.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Claim_Deluxe_Edition_Items.md', within the main section titled 'How to Claim Deluxe Edition Items', specifically from the subsection 'Claiming Deluxe Edition Items in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
There will be 7 items waiting for you there including a **Weapon, Armor set, and a Curio**. If you've purchased the Deluxe Edition after passing this point, just interact with the nearest Shrine to collect your items.
